name: Tracy's NEScapades
description:
In Tracy's NEScapades, you're Tracy "Mimi" Plumlee, a nana who must journey through five of her favorite Nintendo Entertainment System games to rescue her grandkids from the clutches of the dastardly 8-Bits.

Tracy's NEScapades is a real NES game I developed for my mom as a gift for Christmas 2021.  With a limited production run of exactly one cartridge, it technically counts as one of the rarest NES games ever produced.  It was developed in NESmaker and features five parodies of my mom's favorite NES games reimagined as platformers.   All graphics, music, and sound effects are original by me. 

While I work on an in-browser version, you can download the ROM here and play it in your favorite NES emulator!
